lead_paragraph: Nissan is recalling nearly 930,000 Altima midsize cars worldwide — some for a third time — to fix a latch problem that could let the hood fly open while the cars are moving.

headline.print_headline: Nissan Recalls 930,000 Altimas for Hood Latch Fix
headline.main: Nissan Recalls 930,000 Altimas for Hood Latch Fix

snippet: Nissan is recalling nearly 930,000 Altima midsize cars worldwide — some for a third time — to fix a latch problem that could let the hood fly open while the cars are moving.
abstract: Nissan issues worldwide recall of nearly 930,000 Altima cars to fix latch that is supposed to keep hood from opening while car is moving.
